text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: MSI GS Series GS65 STEALTH THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Call of Duty: Warzone, and the performance throttles significantly. The keyboard has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: MSI GS Series GS65 STEALTH THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: MSI GS Series GS65 STEALTH THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the fan noise feels cheap. Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

The Refurbished: MSI GS Series GS65 STEALTH THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: MSI GS Series GS65 STEALTH THIN-037 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It Wi-Fi drops intermittently frequently when playing Cyberpunk 2077, and the performance throttles significantly. The build material has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
